GitHub

  • nprogress

    • Install
      • Usage
        • Custom color

        # @vuepress/plugin-nprogress

        A progress bar plugin based on nprogress.

        # Install

        yarn add -D @vuepress/plugin-nprogress
# OR npm install -D @vuepress/plugin-nprogress

        # Usage

        module.exports = {
  plugins: ['@vuepress/nprogress']
}

        # Custom color

        Set $nprogressColor in your site or theme palette.styl file to change the color of the progress bar (default is $accentColor).

        // .vuepress/styles/palette.styl
// or
// .vuepress/theme/styles/palette.styl

$nprogressColor = red

        Also see:

        • Config Reference > Styling
        Edit this page on GitHub
